Modifications.Value: Archimonde's dark magic defiles a targetted unit along with all nearby enemies. |nDecreases armor; slows movement speed and deals high damage over time to the targets. |nLasts 20 seconds.|n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - 10 max damage per second, reduces armor by 4. 5% Movement speed reduction.|n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - 20 max damage per second, reduces armor by 5. 10% Movement speed reduction.|n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - 30 max damage per second, reduces armor by 6. 15% Movement speed reduction.|n|cffffcc00Level 4|r - 40 max damage per second, reduces armor by 7. 20% Movement speed reduction.

Archimonde's dark magic defiles a targetted unit along with all nearby enemies. |n|nDecreases armor by 4; deals 15 damage per second to the primary target; deals slightly less damage to nearby targets. Also Reduces enemy Movement speed by 5%.|nLasts 15 seconds on units and 10 seconds on heroes.

Archimonde's dark magic defiles a targetted unit along with all nearby enemies. |n|nDecreases armor by 5; deals 25 damage per second to the primary target; deals slightly less damage to nearby targets. Also Reduces enemy Movement speed by 10%.|nLasts 15 seconds on units and 10 seconds on heroes.

Archimonde's dark magic defiles a targetted unit along with all nearby enemies. |n|nDecreases armor by 6; deals 35 damage per second to the primary target; deals slightly less damage to nearby targets. Also Reduces enemy Movement speed by 15%.|nLasts 15 seconds on units and 10 seconds on heroes.

Archimonde's dark magic defiles a targetted unit along with all nearby enemies. |n|nDecreases armor by 7; deals 45 damage per second to the primary target; deals slightly less damage to nearby targets. Also Reduces enemy Movement speed by 20%.|nLasts 15 seconds on units and 10 seconds on heroes.
